room_title: Escape room "Wicked Workshop" by Unravel Escape Rooms in New York
review: The owner was very Nice and helpful. The creepy doll room was a ton of fun and my kids loved it. I recommend this escape room place.

room_title: Escape room "Wicked Workshop" by Unravel Escape Rooms in New York
review: I highly recommend the Wicked Workshop! I've done these before and this was beyond my expectations. The puzzles were extremely challenging (we had 3 people :P) and it had the perfect amount of creepy. But for people who are freaked out by dolls...one may just creep on you. ;)

room_title: Escape room "Wicked Workshop" by Unravel Escape Rooms in New York
review: Our group of 4 did the Wicked Workshop and loved how creative and unique the puzzles were. Solved it and had a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Wicked Workshop" by Unravel Escape Rooms in New York
review: I highly recommend the Wicked Workshop! I've done these before and this was beyond my expectations. The puzzles were extremely challenging (we had 3 people) and it had the perfect amount of creepy. But for people who are freaked out by dolls... one may just creep on you.

room_title: Escape room "Wicked Workshop" by Unravel Escape Rooms in New York
review: It was completely worth the time and money we spend to do something other than usual. I would highly recommend the doll house especially for those who have had experience about going to escape rooms. The staff is super friendly and organized even helpful at times to make it fun. Definitely recommended.
